parameter.description: 0=Disable 1=Enable 2=SystemDisable 3=SystemEnable 4=RequestForEnable 5=Fail<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gt0=Disable 1=Enable 2=SystemDisable 3=SystemEnable 4=RequestForEnable 5=Fail</p&gt <p&gt- 0x02 : Command for disable which is set by platform of Samsung SDS. After setting, if you try to get value of Security Function , '0x00' will be reported.</p&gt <p&gt- 0x03 : Command for enable which is set by platform of Samsung SDS.
